name: Shell Argina S4 40 Local
description: Lubricant for modern and highly rated medium-speed trunk-piston diesel engine applications

globalDocs.name: Shell Argina S4 40 Local EN TDG V1.8 23-Jun-2020

localDocs.name: Shell Argina S4 40 Local Philippines EN 140001435525 EHS V1.2 08-MAR-2021
Shell Argina S4 40 Local Philippines EN TDG V1.8 23-Jun-2020

marketing: Shell Argina S4 40 Local is a multifunctional crankcase lubricant for highly rated medium-speed diesel engines operating on residual fuel. Shell Argina S4 40 Local has a BN of 40 and is designed for conditions of high oil stress. In addition Shell Argina S4 40 Local has been optimised to improve deposit control.
